feedback.head: Found a bug?
feedback.description: Report any unexpected behaviours or bugs on the OpenSearch GitHub repo. The team will make sure your issue gets the attention of the right folks.

page.title: OpenSearch
page.description: OpenSearch is a community-driven, open source search and analytics suite derived from Apache 2.0 licensed Elasticsearch 7.10.2 & Kibana 7.10.2. It consists of a search engine daemon, OpenSearch, and a visualization and user interface, OpenSearch Dashboards. OpenSearch enables people to easily ingest, secure, search, aggregate, view, and analyze data.

docs.title: OpenSearch Documentation
